main event: Two separate incidents are documented regarding mysterious white balls of light and a saucer-shaped object seen in Rouen, France and Circleville, Ohio in 1948.
interesting points: The Rouen, France incident involved reports of mysterious white balls of light, airplane flights, and descents by parachute, sparking a police investigation.
The report from Circleville, Ohio describes the sighting of a saucer-shaped object hovering above buildings, emitting a blinding orange light from a dome, and later changing to a dim amber.
The UFO observed in Circleville, Ohio was described as about sixty feet in diameter and ten to twelve feet thick, with a metallic appearance.
The object in Circleville, Ohio appeared to be positioned in a way that suggested someone inside the dome was curious about a bluish-green glow from a building's windows.
The report from Circleville, Ohio also mentions the object passing over a farm building and disappearing from view, leaving the witness unable to see inside the object.
sighted object: mysterious white balls of light and a saucer-shaped object
witnesses: Peasants in Rouen, France and the owner of a farm in Circleville, Ohio
